GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Document Editor, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange Active Sync), OneNote, Microsoft Outlook, Excel, Word, Power Point
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Speed Dialing, Loudspeaker, Call Divert
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Handset, User Guide, Battery, Charger, Headset

Multimedia.Music Player: Yes, Supports AMR, AAC, AAC-LC, ASF, WMA, M4A, GSM FR, HE-AAC, MP3, WMA, AMR-NB
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports AVC, Windows Video, 3GP, MP4, H.264, 3G2, MPEG4, H.263, VC-1

Camera.Other Camera Features: Sensor Size: 1/4-inch, Auto Focus, f-number/aperture: f/2.4, Focal Length: 28 mm, Focus Range: 10 cm, Auto and Manual White Balance, Automatic Photo Upload to OneDrive, Camera Apps: Bing Vision, Creative Studio, Lumia Camera

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (HFP 1.6, GATT, OPP 1.1, A2DP 1.2, AVRCP 1.4, PAN 1.1, PBAP 1.1)
Internet & Connectivity.Navigation Technology: A-GPS, A-GLONASS, with HERE Drive+, Bing Maps, HERE Maps

Other Features.Additional Features: Micro-USB-B System Connectors, OneDrive Cloud Storage, 15 GB Free Cloud Storage, Double-tap to Wake, Tactile Feedback, Vibrating Alerts, Word Flow Keyboard, WLAN Support, Peer-to-peer Sharing: Lumia Beamer, Lumia Storyteller, Device Lock, PIN Code, Device, Voice Input
Other Features.Important Apps: Xbox Music, MixRadio, Skype Video Call, Facebook, Linkedin, Twitter, WeChat, Line, WhatsApp, Flickr, Foursquare, OneDrive, Picasa, YouTube, Touch UI, DirectX 11, Lync (Corporate IM) Free Download, Company Hub for Enterprise Applications, Nokia Photo Trans
Other Features.Sensors: Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor, Orientation Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: High Brightness Mode, Sunlight Readability Enhancement, Brightness Control, Scratch Resistant Glass, Tactile Feedback, Corning Gorilla Glass 3, Multi-point Touch
